properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 2:31PM MST until January 13 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne WY
properties.description:
...PROLONGED MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW OVER THE SIERRA MADRE RANGE
THIS WEEKEND...

* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to
13 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 to 40 mph.

* WHERE...Sierra Madre Mountain Range.

* WHEN...From 11 AM Saturday to 5 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Heavy snow and blowing snow could significantly reduce
visibility. These conditions will make it easy for hikers,
skiers, snowmobilers, etc. to get disoriented and lost. Please
use caution if you are participating in any outdoor winter
recreation.
properties.instruction:
Keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle and/or
with you in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SATURDAY TO 5 AM MST MONDAY
